com.bham.bd.components.environment

Class Obstacle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bham.bd.entity.BaseGameEntity
      • com.bham.bd.components.environment.Obstacle

  • public class Obstacle
extends BaseGameEntity
    Class defining common properties for any obstacle

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private EnumSet<Attribute> ATTRIBUTES
      Set of attributes this obstacle has (e.g., WALKABLE, BREAKABLE etc)

      The current frame that should be rendered for the obstacle if it is animated

    • Constructor Detail

      • Obstacle

        public Obstacle(int x,
                int y,
                ArrayList<Attribute> attributes,
                Tileset tileset,
                int... tileIDs)
        Constructs an obstacle by default giving it 50 HP
        Parameters:
        x - top-left position in x axis
        y - top-left position in y axis
        attributes - array list of Attribute values which define the obstacle
        tileset - type of tileset
        tileIDs - IDs of tiles in case the obstacle is animated (must be 1 or more)

    • Method Detail

      • destroy

        private void destroy()
        Simulates the destruction effect and removes the obstacle from the entity list

      • getAttributes

        public EnumSet<Attribute> getAttributes()
        Gets all the important attributes described in Attribute this obstacle has
        Returns:
        EnumSet containing all the attributes this obstacle possesses

      • interacts

        public void interacts(int graphSystemID,
                      int nodeID,
                      Rectangle area)
        Notifies about obstacle's interaction with some rectangular area

        This method is used by the graph system to mainly check the interaction of BREAKABLE obstacles

        Parameters:
        graphSystemID - ID of the graph system to be notified about intersection
        nodeID - ID of the node intersecting the obstacle
        area - Rectangle representing an intersection area

      • changeHp

        public void changeHp(double health)
        Changes HP of this obstacle

        HP is only changed if the obstacle has BREAKABLE attribute. If the obstacle is destroyed, the graph system is notified about it to add free graph nodes.

        Parameters:
        health - amount of health points that should be added/subtracted to this obstacle's HP

        public void update()
        Specified by:
        update in class BaseGameEntity

      • getHitBox

        public Rectangle getHitBox()
        Description copied from class: BaseGameEntity
        Gets the hit-box of the entity

        Hit-box is a shape with size and location properties. In most cases it is either a circle or a rectangle.

        Specified by:
        getHitBox in class BaseGameEntity
        Returns:
        the shape of the hit-box

      • getHitBoxRadius

        public double getHitBoxRadius()
        Description copied from class: BaseGameEntity
        Gets the outer radius of the hit-box

        If it's a circle it gets its radius, if its any other shape, it gets the radius of the outer circle that would be generated around the hit-box.

        Specified by:
        getHitBoxRadius in class BaseGameEntity
        Returns:
        size of hit-box radius
